modName: Bosmer Armor Pack - Arrow Inspired Recolor
summary: A recoloring of the Bosmer armor set to match Arrow's green theme.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HjZpDQA.png[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/lxBZe9L.png[/img]

A recoloring of the Bosmer armor set to match Arrow's green theme. Should be compatible with both the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37289/?]Standalone[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19733/?]Immersive Armors[/url] versions.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/lxBZe9L.png[/img]

If you are looking for the bow, it can be found as part of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28545/?]Ghosu's Weapon Pack[/url]. [code]Thanks to Hyacathusarullistad for pointing it out.[/code]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/lxBZe9L.png[/img]

[color=#FF0000]Credits go to Arynn, Isilmeriels, and Maty743 for the original mod assets found at the link below.[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37289/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37289/?[/url]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/lxBZe9L.png[/img]
author: Coldchaos

files.name: Bosmer Arrow Green Recolor - Original Bright
